message:
# Final Statement from P2

Fellow players, what an incredible journey we've shared. Throughout this game, I've strived to balance strategic gameplay with genuine human connection. I've valued each relationship formed here, maintained loyalty where possible, and made difficult decisions with integrity. 

While P7 has played impressively, my consistent approach of thoughtful strategy combined with authentic connections has brought me here. I never put targets on anyone without reason and always sought to understand different perspectives. I would be honored to have your vote to win this game we've all invested so much in together.

Fellow players, thank you for this journey. Iâ€™ve played a loyal, thoughtful, and strategic gameâ€”never hiding, always adapting. I built genuine connections and avoided unnecessary conflict, earning my place here through consistency and respect. P2 played well, but I ask you to consider who stayed true to their word and contributed to a fair, engaging game. I hope Iâ€™ve earned your trust and your vote. Letâ€™s finish this with integrity. Thank you.
